website_summaries.verdict: These very comfortable professional knee pads come with a lifetime warranty, so you’ve got nothing to lose in trying them.
pros: Hook-and-loop straps around the thigh and around the knee for a snug, custom fit
High-density foam padding with gel cushioning inside
cons: They can slip/fall with a lot of walking or movement
Some feel the knee pad doesn’t sit flat enough, which could cause knee roll

customer_reviews.title: Best knee pads i have bought in 25 years of construction
customer_reviews.text: Im a contractor and bought 2 pairs of these for me and my son. He wears his all day long and they are the best that we have ever used at a reasonable price. I have tried multiple brands from 10-60 bucks and nothing has come close to these.
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: Best Knee Pads
customer_reviews.text: These are great knee pads. Easy to put on, stay securely in place, and afford complete freedom of movement while you are wearing them. The way they attach above the knee and below makes them very comfortable with no sense of cutting off circulation and binding behind your knee. And the padding protecting the knee is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Fall Short
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and do a great job of protecting your knees. Unfortunately, they fall short when staying in place if you do a lot of walking and kneeling. They wind up around your shins regardless of how tight you make them. A decent buy but don’t expect them to stay put for any length of time. I would not recommend these or any others with the same type straps. Update: Amazon and the company made this order right so I will up my rating from two stars to four stars even though for a person doing a lot of walking and kneeling the pads are going to wind up around your ankles, otherwise great pads.
customer_reviews.author: H. E. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Finally, comfortable Knee Pads!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing these knee pads I’ve purchased 4 different bands of pads that were all problematic. None of them stay up when I’m standing or walking and most of them have straps that end up behind my knees and and cut off my circulation. Today I wore my REXBETI’s all day while installing wood baseboard in a house that’s being renovated and I was amazed at how comfortable they were and they never dropped down onto my calves or affected my circulation in any way. They worked well and were totally comfortable, I almost left them on for lunch not even realizing they were still on!
customer_reviews.author: Rickcin

customer_reviews.title: very good knee pads
customer_reviews.text: these are the best knee pads I have ever bought - easy to put on,comfortable, stay in place and provide excellent protection
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Megson

customer_reviews.title: cheap price for good quality...
customer_reviews.text: first day and I like them, no more pain on the back of my knees 😷
customer_reviews.author: esteban lopez

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Falling apart after very little use. I have worn these 6 times and the velcro is tearing off the straps (see photos). They also retain sweat and take a long time to dry thus retaining the odor and/or still wet the next day. On a positive note, if you align the straps up just right the velcro does not rub against your skin.
customer_reviews.author: J&SB

customer_reviews.title: Working man's knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I rocked these knee pads extremely hard for a week just to see what I thought. They're pretty comfortable they don't slide the grip is nice on a rainy day on a roof. The only reason I didn't give it 4 stars was because after six to eight hours of wearing them they started to be get uncomfortable and my knees were pretty sweaty. I haven't encountered a pair of knee pads that actually counter those issues however that was why I did not give 5 stars....
customer_reviews.author: Practical&Thorough Dued

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is great.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, like being on pillows. They don't slip down while wearing them, I highly recommend them. SAVE YOUR KNEES!
customer_reviews.author: Repairman

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Pads
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads are great, and provide good comfort for my knees. The strap above the knee is so nice and comfortable, and does not allow for the pad to keep sliding down constantly, or having to readjust. It also does not kink or bundle behind your knees causing irritation after being up and down on your knees. I ordered another pair as to how satisfied I am with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent J. Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Kneel down and be happy!
customer_reviews.text: Life saver, i work in tight spaces, crawl spaces, concrete surfaces, you name it these pads have saved me! They absorb the pressure created by kneeling perfectly! They also came with velcro extensions should you have some muscle on them bones and need a little more length for adjustments to fit your properly!! I previously used the hard shell plastic knee pads, they would work ok for a minute or two, but my knees would still hurt. That problem has now been solved thanks to these wonderful knee pads!! So far they have remained unphased to my abuse on them. Other than a couple of surface scratches i have no fear that these will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Casa1180

customer_reviews.title: Awsome kneepads.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a scaffold builder and bought these kneepads for work. Very confprtable to wear all day. They are not very expensive compared to others that i looked through. The only thing is that the slide down my knees after a while but i guess its from being on my knees most of the time. Other than that they are very durable and good for the price. I recommend them and i would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: NOT GEL
customer_reviews.text: padding feels like a very stiff foam and if it is by some chance gel it is the stiffest gel I've ever felt. also has no side walls to keep centered so if you crawl around on your knees while wearing these they will constantly wrap around to the side of your leg defeating the purpose of knee pads. knees are literally in pain after the first day of wearing these. will be returning and buying name brand knee pads from now on since my name brand ones have lasted me years and am only replacing because the strap that goes around leg is so wore out.
customer_reviews.author: Jaremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For This DIY-er
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to these Rexbeti knee pads,I no longer have to gingerly lower myself to one knee then the other while I'm installing the new LVP floor throughout my entire home. And I can walk on my knees without pain. Thanks to the "thigh" section above the knee they stay in position all day without having the straps super-tight. I've worn them over pant legs and directly on my knees while wearing shorts. They seem well made. I've been using them for only a few days (4-6 hours per day), so I can't speak to the durability. So far I would absolutely consider another pair when/if these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: AlanH

customer_reviews.title: Look great but!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way they fit and how they strapped on. The knee pad is too thick and as you move around on your knees the pads slid to the side of your knee pulling your knee cap with it. These caused more pain than not using knee pads at all. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mullen

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars are generous
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these if you intend to wear them with shorts. There are competitors that make all neoprene straps that do not dig into your legs like these (think qep). I promise if you try to wear them with shorts you'll wish you had just walked on your knees on gravel all day instead of having the straps dig into your skin. I dislike products that are clearly not designed by people who actually test/use them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The envy of co-workers
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and protective. I work night crew in freight distribution and stocking in a major grocery store. That means a lot of time on my knees, plus getting up and down, and walking around (about 4 miles per shift.) If I put these pads on snuggly at the beginning of the shift, I rarely have to adjust them at all. They are comfy, and well padded. I've ordered another pair for one co-worker, and several others are considering or have ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Wide straps don't cut up back of knees and legs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a replacement for another brand of knee pads that were worn out. The RexBeti pads in the front of the knees are OK and comfortable, but where they stand out IMHO is that they have fairly wide straps that are MUCH easier on the back of my knees and legs than their predecessors. Also, once firmly attached, they seem to pretty much stay put without sliding around or down. I've only used them for about three weeks (tile work), so I can't comment on the long term durability, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Esso

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and protects well. My old pair were positioned on the knee and used elastic straps that looped through a buckle and allowed you to pull them tight. After a while, they lost elasticity and kept slipping down or off to the side causing you to reposition and retighten while working. These have two parts, one above and another on the knee that are held on by velcro straps. I've been been using them for planting and weeding for about a month and they stay put throughout the job. This isn't long enough to give them a 5 on durability but they seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can walk on my knees!
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by a good friend. I have not been able to put pressure on my knees without sharp pains that shoot up from the knees to the hips. I want to tile the whole house starting with a shower complete remodel. I got these today and for the first time in years, I was able to walk on my knees! I was worried about fit, as I have always had thick legs and thighs. They included velcro extenders, but I did not need them they fit perfect with out them . Awesome The straps are wide and I wear them over my slacks, they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Work in all conditions
customer_reviews.text: The fit is excellent. The velcro straps work great and stay where they are placed. The hard shell works for rocks, cement, and whatever is beneath them. I don't feel anything no matter what surface. The inside is cushy and is easy on knees. The thigh strap stays where placed. I have had no problems with the pads moving down as others have. The pads may cost a bit more than the cheap ones, but are well worth the cost in having no pain and a secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: Best knee pads I've ever used!!!! Six stars!!
customer_reviews.text: Having been in construction all my life, I've used a lot of knee pads. And while some have been comfortable, and other have held up well, they all share a common problem - they slip. NOT THESE!! Their design is excellent, with a strap that goes above the knee and then the pad itself below the knee, both held in place with wide pieces of Velcro that grip like iron. And the pads themselves are super comfortable on the inside and rugged on the outside. Truly excellent knee pads - can't recommend them highly enough!!
customer_reviews.author: bendwriter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads are awesome! They feel extremely comfortable to wear and provide a great cushion for my knees to rest on when I’m doing work. I usually wear them for about 1-2 hours at a time and my knees don’t hurt after resting on them for that long. We are doing a bunch of house projects, the main one installing new flooring so knee pads were a must! I’m buying a second pair for my fiancé to wear because they’re so comfy. They seem very durable, Velcro seems thick and won’t break and the padding on the outside seems sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: ReneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Protect those knees Drs orders
customer_reviews.text: I had my knee replaced in December and doc said protect the knees. I just built 3 decks and put in plank floor while sequestered at my cabin and I wore the pads the whole time they were fantastic I could not believe how much cushion They gave to my knees first thing I put on in the morning over my pants or my kneepads and I wore them all day long first thing I took off at the end of the day for my kneepads I’ve even sent pictures to brother-in-law‘s who have bought them and just love them good job
customer_reviews.author: Jabco

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the cheap ones from Harbor Freight.
customer_reviews.text: I have large legs from exercise and the cheap ones I bought from Harbor Freight would pop the Velcro all the time. The Velcro on these have enough length so that they do not do that. Plus they give you longer straps if you need them. I have had multiple knee surgeries and anytime I kneel down on any surface it hurts. Don't even notice it with these on. The thigh strap keeps them from twisting around your knee. This is a big plus over the cheaper ones I bought. Will have to see how they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: chucky333

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knee pads as I do a lot of DIY projects in and around the house. My older knee pads were fairly basic and quite uncomfortable. While I haven't used these extensively, my first impression is that these are quite comfortable. They come with extension straps that allows for a comfortable fit for people of all sizes. I am happy with the quality of these knee pads and they are a good value for money!
customer_reviews.author: adilj

customer_reviews.title: Knee pads
customer_reviews.text: My husband is beyond pleased with these knee pads. He has tried others and feels these are far more superior. His co-workers have ordered them as well because they like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: You have to try these kneepads
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different kneepads in my work but these pads are so much better i never thought pad could be so comfortable, they stay in place no slipping and having to pull them up all the time, brilliant idea, the top stays in place and bends at the knee with the pad in place no matter how you twist or turn while going to your knees. As i said above you must try these if you use kneepads and especially if you wear them all day long. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: larry  starr

customer_reviews.title: Happy Knees Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband & he approves! (Construction & electrical) He says it has saved his knees when crawling on rocks & gravel under houses & on wooden beams in attics. No slipping, great cushioning & happy knees. He's happy so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: ZiaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Sizing does not fit men who are weight lifters, have larger thighs, or non the average Male size.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: customer service was great to work with. They were able to send me extra straps that help to extend around my legs. Much better. The product looked good, but I was unable to use them because the straps aren't large enough and nor do they stretch to wrap around my legs. So I will return them and continue shopping for knee pads that can fit my legs properly. I strongly advise if you don't have thin legs to stay away from these knee pads. But again, I can't comment about the feel and quality of the product because I was unable to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Forestal

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased. Works Very Well.
customer_reviews.text: The best that I have ever used. I am very pleased with these kneepads. I have been crawling around underneath my house for the last couple of days and these have made an undesirable task less painful...literally. They stay positioned well with the double Velcro straps and the company had enough forethought to include Velcro extensions for bigger legs. I have tried many cheaper kneepads in the past for about half the price, but these are definitely worth the little extra cost. What a knee saver!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady4x4

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a General Contractor and owns his own business- You could say he's a Jack-of-All-Trades- He does decking, roofing, flooring, etc~ Finding comfortable knee pads for my 6'5" husband has been a chore!!! Either the straps were cutting into the back of his knees or he was having to pull them up constantly because they were sliding down to his shins!! NOT ANYMORE!! He can't thank me enough for these! Another PLUS~ My husband works 24/7 and could wear out Titanium, I swear~ No signs of wear with these so far!!! I HIGHLY Recommend and will DEFINITELY buy again, when and IF needed!!!! BTW~ My husband is 6'5 215lbs.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Hameister

customer_reviews.title: They work...
customer_reviews.text: These actually stay put on my chicken legs... upper strap cinches tight above the knee and allows you to walk and kneel, and walk again without them falling down around the ankles. Would have rated a five star if the outer contact patch was softer....it’s basically a hard plastic cap on the outside, those who wear them all day tend to appreciate a little extra softness when you hit the deck... similar to wearing super hard sole boots, yet semi soft on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband had needed a pair of these for quite some time. This is another product that I chose for him by reading reviews. I read so many reviews of many different knee pads and settled on this set. Plus I needed them to fit him, he is a big guy and everything is eight XL or 3XLHe loves them and they make it so when he kneels down working on a vehicle it doesn't even feel like he is kneeling. That makes me so happy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Motor City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to use after he had knee replacement surgery and went back to work. There is an extra length of strap to use in it for people with thick upper legs. This is the main reason I purchased these knee pads. He liked the upper part that helps keep the pads from sliding down. We are going to recommend that his brother gets these too as he will be having knee surgery next month and will need extra padding after he recovers and is back to work (he is a plumber). I would recommend this product to anyone that spends lots of time working on their knees
customer_reviews.author: Aimee N Bott

customer_reviews.title: Knees say "more padding"
customer_reviews.text: The reason for only 3 stars is- Lack of padding, after about an hour it feels like I've got no pads on at all. Sure they might stay in place, but your not getting much work done if your knees can't take it. For the money I shouldn't have to go out and buy extra padding.
customer_reviews.author: Rich R.

customer_reviews.title: Complete protection for your knees
customer_reviews.text: I am not in the consteuction field. I bought these in order to do modified push ups and planks (chronic health issues). They are also great for gardening as even a soft lawn hurts my knees. The gel padding is thick-My knees are on a cloud. The straps attach above and below the knee and do not slip. I am also pleasantly surprised at how well made they are for $25.99. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: LDM

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads aren’t worth your money! Had them not even a month
customer_reviews.author: Josh Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knee protection!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for approximately 2 hours while hand scrubbing a tile floor and grout. They are wonderful for the protection of your knees; I could actually "drop" down on my knees with no issue. The reason for a 4 star for comfort was that I am in Florida and had shorts on while wearing them. They did get a little annoying on the back of my legs, which I am sure would not happen with pants underneath. Would highly recommend these however!
customer_reviews.author: Bogie jw

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads for any floor work
customer_reviews.text: Got these knee pads to work on my floors and patio stonework. These are very comfy on the knees and stable to work with. Even though they aren’t the cheapest on the web, they are worth the cost when doing the flooring for many hours. The quality so far has held up to a lot of skidding through the floors and knee-walking side to side. If you plan on working with comfort on the floors, these knee pads are worth looking at.
customer_reviews.author: DrRH

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty thick and well made
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads are thick and heavy duty . The pictures don’t really show how well made they are. I’m impressed with the thickness.i plan on redoing my flooring and bought these to protect my knees . They will be great, and I can use them for other home jobs .
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Better than NoCry
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of knee pads for vinyl plank flooring install. These and the NoCry brand. My girlfriend started with the NoCry and kept crying, so I foolishly switched her after the first day. Then I had to do all the crying. These Rexbetis were fantastic, all things considered. Not perfect necessarily, but much better than the NoCry, which have similarly high reviews for about the same price. The two brands should switch names, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cave Dweller

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable and feel solid
customer_reviews.text: I walked around all day today with these knee pads and barely knew they were on. There was almost no slippage no matter what I did; on the tractor, in and out of my truck and climbing over walls. I literally forgot they were on. When kneeling, I felt like my knees were floating. For the money, these knee pads are awesome. I gave 4 stars for durability as I am one day in and so how would I know. They look very solid, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: John Condon

customer_reviews.title: A very good set of knee pads.
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. I have an old pair of knee pads and these are head and shoulders above those. My biggest problem with my older ones is that they would not stay in place. With the two strap system these stay where you put them. The reason I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 is that when I remove them, I have found that the area where I have them fastened is damp from sweat. Kind of odd as that occurs even if I don't sweat anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: B. Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Pads!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I’m a 15 year Hardwood floor guy and have used several different knee pads. These do not slide down as easily as the others knee pads I have used before. (Almost never) The comfort is great the padding is very good. The Velcro straps on top and bottom of the knee are very comfortable. I’m sure the Velcro will wear out as other Velcro knee pads I’ve used before did, but that is to be expected from daily use. Overall I would highly recommend these and I will be getting more when I wear these ones down.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F

customer_reviews.title: very comfortabl
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the upper strap will hold them up on the knee. I dont have to constantly adjust. I have a very bad knee and now I can get down with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Burks

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable gel knee pad that saves my knees scraping and looking like I’m 5 years old again
customer_reviews.text: Knee pads were shipped promptly and were exactly as described on page. I am concerned at the top of the pad it seems to be pulling really hard on the seam. They also don’t stay up as well as expected, I take about 5 steps after getting up and have to pull them up the top strap doesn’t go down past my knee when it slides so that is the reason for 4 stars. They are super comfortable to crawl through my landscape to weed and the gel provides plenty of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material - will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality material. Have only had them a few days and one of the straps is already tearing at stitching. I would not purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hill

customer_reviews.title: Lunch Break!
customer_reviews.text: Update, my husband had as his knee pads for a while now a year? Still wearing it for it lasted that long we thought we would take a picture of it to show that it's in Good condition. /My husband had a knee surgery about 2 years ago and he is still working at his age. What we came to like about the knee pads was the stripes that goes around the thighs, holds him in place. A few of the other men at the job sites on their lunch break looked over the Amazon site for knee pads and gloves.. Aloha from Honolulu Hawaii
customer_reviews.author: Charlette A. P. Kealoha

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable with Support
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of knee pads and fortunately I need look no further since my knees don't lie these pads are extremely comfortable. Not much else to say they do the job and look and feel well made so I don't think I will be needing another pair for a long time. The big name logo is a bit loud but a non issue for me
customer_reviews.author: Bob WellerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Knee Pads! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We are remodeling our home. Both my husband and I have knee injuries! These knee pads are great. My husband said my knees hurt just from a lot of work but not from being on his knees. They are comfortable and stay in place. Would definitely recommend! I bought 4 pair so that when others come and help, they will be protected as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melismiles

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these every day for 4 weeks while doing a welding project and was on my knees most of the time. They hold up well. The leg straps will hurt the back of your legs after a while but other than that their great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: As an ACTIVE 70 year old I do a lot of different things, installing hard wood and composite flooring, roofing, cement, rock walls, working on various vehicles, and bikes, carpentry, plumbing, and electrical work. With 8 children (all grown, 20 grandchildren (a couple grown) and 1 great grandchild it is rare and momentary when there isn't a project I'm not involved in and my knees have NEVER felt so good in a pair of pads. These have been GREAT in EVERY situation. They don't slip, they are comfortable and they are durable. NO MORE ACHY SORE SWOLLEN KNEES!
customer_reviews.author: mtndsrtlobo

customer_reviews.title: I can kneel in my garden again!
customer_reviews.text: The knee pads have allowed me to kneel and work in my garden again. My arthritis was really bothering me whenever I knelt in the garden to work. I visited the acupuncturist and he told me no more kneeling in the garden. A friend suggested I try knee pads. Luckily, I found the Rexbeti gel knee pads. I'm kneeling in the garden, sometimes on large rocks and couldn't be happier. The gel pads absorb the rough bumps and cushion my knees. I'm so grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Amy's Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Also great for yard work
customer_reviews.text: I bought several different kneepads over the years and after a month of use they were already getting flimsy. Tried these and until now they are holding up really well. I'm talking about several hours a day on my knees to do some weeding, planting, etc... Been using for a few weeks now and very happy with it. will definitely reorder these when the day comes
customer_reviews.author: Tam C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Design goes easy on my knees
customer_reviews.text: Love the how the gel insert helps my knees..I can work longer on my knees without feeling myself against a hard uncomfortable surface. The straps keep the pads securely in place and there are extensions which help this pad fit any size. These pads have been a blessing and I reccomend these to anyone who does carpeting or construction work. Anyone who has to work on their knees for long stretches would benefit greatly from these pads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I install AC so I'm in attics every day. These are good knee pads. Velcro is strong and doesn't stretch and the thigh strap is great cause it keeps the pad from shifting. My only problem was the pad inside is not thick enough. My knees are bad and I need thicker gel pads. Other than that these are great
customer_reviews.author: daniel limon

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knee pads to replace an old pair that I'd been using once in a while for years. The old ones were constantly falling down and weren't particularly comfortable. I was replacing the deck boards on a huge deck that required me to work on my knees for hours and days at a time. These kneepads were a godsend. I used them with shorts as well as with jeans. They worked well in both cases. I highly recommended these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: TurboDC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable because they do not pinch the backside of your knee. If you are on your knees for very long most pads feel like they're cutting off the circulation in your leg. These feel fine even after wearing for several hours. They seem very durable and should last quite a while. The only thing I would like to change is the plastic on the front. I wish it was softer so that it would not slide.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Rat

customer_reviews.title: Good pads
customer_reviews.text: I have bursitis in my knee and the Dr said i have to wear knee pads for work. These are great. Two straps and they don't fall down my legs or twist to the side while i work
customer_reviews.author: Stratford Henry

customer_reviews.title: Buy These - It's a No-Brainer
customer_reviews.text: Coming from using a 'home improvement store' brand of knee pads that pinched the heck out of the back of my legs and were generally uncomfortable to these REXBETI knee pads is like going from a bed of nails to a featherbed. Seriously - these are the most comfortable that I've used in 30 years - hold up well too.
customer_reviews.author: BrotherDave

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and protection
customer_reviews.text: I was getting these to lay out stone and gravel in the yard for drainage issues. I was constantly up and back down on my knees, and it's wonderful (being a 67 yr old man) that you can 'fall' on your knees from standing, landing on rock and gravel and protruding roots, and not feel anything but padding. They did move around on me a little bit, but never to the point of not being in place to protect my knees. I love them, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: Big Knee Pads for Bigger Guys!
customer_reviews.text: If you have bigger legs, stop looking and buy this now. I had to return other knee pads, because the staps were for 150lb guys. If you are 250 ... this will fit!! They are big, comfortable and FIT! Good job to the manufacturer for considering all sizes of people! Job well done.
customer_reviews.author: Big Lou in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Best out of three
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Comfortable knee pads that stay in place. I’ve bought 3 sets of different brands this month. These have straps long enough to fit around my legs and hold while getting up and down [plus they give you strap extenders, which I didn’t have to use). They also reached out to me to see if I was happy with my purchase. Good product, good service. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: great for work all day
customer_reviews.text: These may well be the best knee pads I've ever worn while crawling around on my hands and knees. I have severe knee pain to begin with from an old injury that never healed right, so knee pads are a must, and these are pretty sweet. I've crawled over concrete and asphalt, and they hold up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Dennis

customer_reviews.title: like kneeling on pillows
customer_reviews.text: We are redoing 1300 sq/ft of flooring. The old knee pads my husband used were not helping. We saw the reviews and description of these, and got them. Couldn't be happier. The ONLY complaint is that the seam at the top that hits the side of the knee rubs a bit & irritates the skin. That was alleviated by a tube sock. They fit, don't fall down, save the knees. Would recommend to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used and abused knee pads for the past 14 years this is the first pair that not only gave me cushioning but also felt snug and secure and it didn’t hurt my wallet I also have a neoprene allergy which is used in most knee pads and with these I didn’t have a reaction very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Keith Castro

customer_reviews.title: my knee is not very good. i need to fix my floor this week
customer_reviews.text: my knee is not very good .i need to fix my floor this week .so i got this knee pads.very comfrotable to wear it .nice stuff
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Good knee pads are hard to come by. I was hoping that these would be a worthwhile purchase. However, the product design has a serious flaw. The stitching through the impact pad is left exposed at the top when you are on your knees. It would only be a matter of time before one of those threads tears and then the whole pad comes undone. This isn't something you could fix with a typical sewing machine. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ryger

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for handymen, tradesmen and flooring installers
customer_reviews.text: Definitely I’d recommend these knee pads. If you are a handyman or a tradesman who spends time on your knees you can’t go wrong with these pads. They won’t fall down to your feet and are easy to adjust. Good quality and compared to the expensive knee pads you can find in the market. I had knee problems and surgery and these pads are like wearing pillows for my knees. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: V. Hazera

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME knee pads, would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different knee pads, all were comfortable and seemed ok, UNTIL you actually had crawl with them. I used them in my very tight crawlspace and all other pads moved,, or came unhooked or generally didn't do their job. These are comfortable, made well and have been great for the 30 or so trips around my crawlspace....None of the othe pads I tried have been even close to these as far as staying in place! These are a little on the warm side, but they perform perfectly...Ive been told I'm a picky bastard too😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I waited before reviewing, but these are good🔥👌🔥
customer_reviews.text: I been used them for a while now and they are comfortable and they really don't slide down, I have them for 12 hours, three days a week and I got to say, their pretty darn good, occasionally you have to kinda pull up a lil so that your knee is in the right spot before you knee down, but once you readjust and your knee is in place on the ground your good. If they wear out on me in a few months I'd order again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Remy🔥😋🔥

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for doing floors
customer_reviews.text: Great knee pads. They stay in place better than the other ones I have. Using them to out in flooring and with these suckers I can be on my knees all day long. They will pinch you if you do not sit straight up or forward, but that might be the jeans bunching up or both. Over all great pads
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new manufactured home and got these so that we can go under the house since there is gravel under there and these worked perfect. They are very comfortable so they can be worn for extended period of times. They are also very durable and should last for a long time. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jrmhknz1981

customer_reviews.title: No more sore knees
customer_reviews.text: First thing that I notice when I opened the box to these bad boys was the tire tread design in the front. I work in construction and I’m always on my knees. Other products I’ve tried always ride up or very uncomfortable. But with these I don’t have to worry about none of that. I can be on my knees all day with these on. Very comfy. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like: sturdy, comfortable, doesnt kink in the back of leg; cleans up well; can wear all day comfortable Dislike: none Overall was looking for the perfect knee pads for general comfort when installing flooring, installing kitchens or cabinets, getting up and down from the floor without having to adjust knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gardening use
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses the knee pads for gardening and was very pleased with them. The knee pads are extremely comfortable and not only that but saving her pants from getting holes/stains when kneeling directly on the ground. My wife has been using the pads for a few weeks now and they seem very sturdy and show promise of lasting a while. We both agree that the knee pads are well made and that the price is very reasonable for this product.
customer_reviews.author: JVA

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great buy. You can walk around with these on with no problem. I have needed for so long , idk why I wanted for like ever to finally buy these. Meanwhile have needed them constantly. I've used the knee mats and they didnt work to well. I'm so excited about these knee pads. Great for gardening too.
customer_reviews.author: Keris

customer_reviews.title: Never Skimp On Protecting Your Knees
customer_reviews.text: These are the best knee pads I've ever purchased. I'm finishing tiling my second large room and my knees experience only very minor discomfort....but when I've been on my knees for more that 4 hours at a time. Others I've used don't hold a candle to the performance of these. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: NHM

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are a little more comfortable then others, but there are still better out there. Velcro straps seem to wear out quickly. so not recommend for everyday construction wear. Also, they are more comfortable over pants. Directly on the skin of the knees the material tends to hurt after awhile. Other then the Velcro they seem to hold up good with strong material.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: i had high hopes for these as i saw a lot of good reviews. I expected a snugger fit around the knees but they seemed to be loose when walking. And my knees hurt afterwards and sometimes during. My knees are truly bad so it could be that there are no knee pads that would be great for me. But then again, my old ones that I just threw away didn't hurt when I was working. So......
customer_reviews.author: Frank E Maier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use them for work, I’m retired but when I have to get on my knees to do jobs around the house these make not only getting down but getting up incredibly easier. Just takes a lot of stress of the ups and downs of getting a simple job done without beating you up. Love em. And the fit better than some of the cheaper stuff I’ve had in the past. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Because I have had both knees replaced it was painful to get down on my knees to clean the floor. I have a lady that comes in every other week but I could see that she wasn't getting places that I wanted cleaned. I purchased these and was able to get every square inch of my laundry room floor cleaned and my knees didn't suffer. So happy I got these.
customer_reviews.author: globarn

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands I've had
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is pretty good and the plastic that covers the knee area is quite solid. I have worn them a couple of times and I really like them. The only thing that kept me from giving it five-star is the "snap" strap which I personally find flimsy although others may not mind this at all. Overall, It's better than the other brands I've had before.
customer_reviews.author: Vcap

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These are good comfortable kneepads that stay put about as well as any of this type. my only complaint is that the straps on the top are barely long enough even when using the extra extension pieces. Too be fair though, i have pretty big legs. Overall, i would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Finally knee pads that stay put
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these knee pads for a couple of months now and find them to be well designed. They stay put and they are like kneeling on air. Like most knee pads, if you wear them all day long you will want to wear suspenders because then tend to pull your pants down from the kneeling-standing transitions over time, but even then without suspenders, you'd only have to readjust the knee pads every hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: A+. Should be your #1 choice
customer_reviews.text: Im 6'2" 270lbs. Im just a DIY guy. I work retail. Being a big guy getting down to work on something is tough on the knees. I found if I have these on my knees dont hurt as bad & its easier to get up. I was looking for a comfortable pair to wear when im in shorts & these are. Very good design with the thigh strap. I high recommened
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Knees
customer_reviews.text: I used these while sanding and staining our new deck and these made it much easier on my knees, it would have taken me twice as long and wrecked my knees if I didn't have them. I will be using them again when it is gardening season again and when I work on my dad's deck. They are so worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Draven

customer_reviews.title: neat
customer_reviews.text: They save your knees but kind of wear on the back of your legs. Maybe there's something you can do about it but I don't use them enough to have a system yet. Not the most comfortable behind your leg/knee if you plan on wearing them for hours on end but these totally save your knees. I guess it's a tradeoff but I'd much rather have a rash or whatever on the back of my legs than f'd up knees for life.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the "Cadillac" of knee pads.
customer_reviews.text: First time purchase of this particular brand of knee pads but, in all honesty, these are the most comfortable and best built I have ever had and I've been in the flooring business for 45 years. Some brands are cushioned but you don't feel stable and some feel like kneeling on card board. These provide stability while feeling like you are kneeling on a pillow. I'm blown away about how great these are.
customer_reviews.author: john dunn

customer_reviews.title: Still cheaper when replace every 4 mos
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of knee guard. Those feel pretty good when new, but after about 3 month of daily use, the gel got flatten. For optimal protection, I recommend change every 4mos. Even though I replace them every 4 mos, it still cheaper than big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: K-Mak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used for working in flower beds. Have had several other brands / styles over the years which have moved around and not stayed under the knee -- these are comfortable and seem to stay in position. They need to send four (4) additional lengthening straps vs just 2 for those of us with big legs. The Velcro does like to attract my mulch so I have to keep cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These replaced an old pair of foam knee pads and surpassed my expectations. They are easy to wear and I love the Velcro straps. I was using them to crawl around my crawl space on sand and they were great. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Babbs

customer_reviews.title: The perfect knee pads!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic knee pads. I spent a few hours on my knees pulling weeds in rock beds and I was completely comfortable the entire time. The pads were thick and the Velcro straps held great. Going to buy another pair for my spouse.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Campers

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Husband has a very hard time when working while on his knees. Prior to using these knee pads, he was unable to move across the floor without a lot of pain. Now he successfully worked nonstop for about an hour without pain in his knees.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Safety, Comfort and Value
customer_reviews.text: They don't slide down, they cushion all around and they're price right. What more could I ask for. Did I mention that they are made tough. Most of my kneeling work around my home is done on river rock. These knee pads are made to take it.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Like Pillows on Your Knees
customer_reviews.text: I am a weekend warrior so looking for comfort, avoid knee replacement and avoid adjusting all the time. Pros: Pads stay in place. Gel inserts feel like you have a thick cushion on your knees Durable so far Does not leave marks on wood floors Cons: Another item to store
customer_reviews.author: Rodney S.

customer_reviews.title: Great knee saver
customer_reviews.text: Used these for replacing our roof (sheathing, shingles, ...). Comfortable and easy to adjust. Grips well on both smooth sheathing and shingles. No sliding or slipping. Also, fit well on trim 105 lb. woman. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great but would love to have more of the gel feel between the pads and knee. The word " professional " was scrapped off the 1st day. Now it says " profes ional ". The pads are a lil bulky but it's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Her

customer_reviews.title: Knee comfort all day long
customer_reviews.text: The design is a little different with regard to attachment to the body. The top attachment is spaced far away from the pad allowing greater comfort during none use (just standing). I like these and use these all the time. I'm working toward making these a standard wear item when working around the house.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eric Brewington

product_meta.title: Knee Pads for Work, Construction Gel Knee Pads Tools by REXBETI, Heavy Duty Comfortable Anti-slip Foam Knee Pads for Cleaning Flooring and Garden, Strong Stretchable Straps, 1 Pair
product_meta.description: Color:OrangeIt is very important to protect yourself thoroughly at work, Especially working in a kneeling position is extremely uncomfortable for your whole body. With REXBETI heavy duty knee pads, you get gel cushion and padding to protect your knees from hard and uneven surfaces. It's like a mini set of pillows for your knees. Thanks to the enhanced gel cushion, you will find them to be more comfortable than most knee pads. These versatile knee pads enjoy a multi-purpose design which recommends them for gardening, flooring or constructions. Wear thigh support knee pads that actually stay in place while walking and kneeling. it will snugly fit on your knees. The hard shell will definitely provides an adequate amount of protection.
feature_bullets: REXBETI New Version Ultimate Double Gel- REXBETI are constantly improving all aspects of knee pads, and in 2020, we have made the following new upgrades: we have upgraded the pads with double thick gel and high density foam cushion; Thigh support non-slip design with new high elastic strap; More extension straps; Reinforced stitching; Heavy duty PVC shell with new strong materials

Ergonomic Design- We have upgraded the thigh support non-slip strap with new high elastic materials keeps knee pads snugly in place fit for all-day comfort. Heavy duty PVC shell can prevent hidden dangers from the stone, nails, glass shards when gardening, cleaning and construction work

Double Thick Gel and High Density Foam Cushion provides double comfort and protection, helps reduce the pressure on the kneecaps from floors, masonry, housekeeping, carpet installations and any heavy work

Extra 4 Extension Straps- We have increased 2 more extension straps, you will receive 4 straps in package and each strap is 7 inch long. With easy-to-use adjustable straps, our knee pads can meet every sizes and can quick and easy to put on and take off
Reinforced Stitching and Heavy-Duty materials last for a long time use and provides you the ability to work on any hard surface.REXBETI knee pads are a real asset and give your knees full protection
